sentences.en: A puff of wind blew the papers off the table.
sentences.cn: 一阵风把文件从桌子上吹走.

sentences.en: A puff or two and he was wide - awake.
sentences.cn: 吸了两口烟,他完全醒明白了.

sentences.en: Can I tempt you with a little puff pastry?
sentences.cn: 我能给你尝点泡芙点心吗？

sentences.en: Don’t puff smoke into my face.
sentences.cn: 别把烟朝我脸上喷。

sentences.en: George puffed and panted and he tried to keep up.
sentences.cn: 乔治喘着粗气想跟上。

sentences.en: He blew out three candles with a single puff.
sentences.cn: 他一口气吹灭了三根蜡烛.

sentences.en: He caught up with Gary, puffing for breath .
sentences.cn: 他赶上了加里，累得直喘粗气。

sentences.en: He took a long puff at his rank cigar.
sentences.cn: 他深深抽了一口臭味难当的雪茄烟.

sentences.en: He took a puff at his cigarette.
sentences.cn: 他吸了一口香烟.

sentences.en: He took a puff on his pipe and shook his head.
sentences.cn: 他抽了口烟斗，摇了摇头。

sentences.en: His story ended with his pipe's last dying puff.
sentences.cn: 他的烟斗喷出最后一口有气无力的烟,他的故事也讲完了.

sentences.en: I took a puff on the cigarette and started coughing.
sentences.cn: 我抽了一口烟就开始咳嗽起来。

sentences.en: Like a puff of wholesome , blustery wind the doctor was off.
sentences.cn: 医师象一般清新的劲风那样,飞也似地走了.

sentences.en: Some days afterwards the earth exhaled only a slight puff of smoke.
sentences.cn: 又过几天,地面上只微微冒一点点雾气.

sentences.en: Steam puffed out of the chimney.
sentences.cn: 蒸汽从烟囱里一股一股地喷出来。

sentences.en: The boiler was puffing thick black smoke.
sentences.cn: 锅炉一股股地冒出浓浓的黑烟。

sentences.en: The magician vanished in a puff of smoke.
sentences.cn: 魔术师在一股烟雾中突然不见了。

sentences.en: They tried their best to puff the book they published.
sentences.cn: 他们尽力吹捧他们出版的书.

sentences.en: What is presented to the public as a critical evaluation is really an elaborate puff for him and his magazine.
sentences.cn: 公众所看到的评论界的好评实际上是对他和他的杂志的一种吹捧。

sentences.en: Wind caught the sudden puff of dust and blew it inland.
sentences.cn: 风猛地刮起一阵灰尘，将它吹往内陆。

sentences.en: You will puff her up with such ideas of her own beauty.
sentences.cn: 你总是替她鼓吹,使得她认为自己美丽.

trans.tran_en: to breathe quickly and with difficulty after the effort of running, carrying something heavy etc
